comments.author: Jeff Dever
comments.body:
Added Matthew Albright's files from the mailing list:
http://www.mail-archive.com/commons-dev@jakarta.apache.org/msg01702.html

Still to be done:
1) instrument for commons-logging
2) write a junit test suite
3) add to some of the example programs

Thanks Matthew for the code, and thanks to Mark for bringing this up again.

comments.author: Jeff Dever
comments.body: *** HTTPCLIENT-96 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

comments.author: Jeff Dever
comments.body:
Multi-part post is in place.

Thanks to everyone who worked on it.

description: Add a new method to support multi-part post.
